mapper.select: SELECT a.student_id,a.student_name,a.telephone,a.department,a.major,a.begin_time,a.end_time,a.reason,a.is_agree,a.code FROM content a,class b WHERE b.teacher_id = #{id} AND LEFT(a.student_id,10) = b.id AND a.is_agree = 'no' ORDER BY a.begin_time DESC
